amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-919 to require institutions of higher education, as part of the annual counseling process mandated by the bill, to inform a student borrower that the loan amounts the student uses during an academic term will count towards the student's aggregate loan amounts, regardless of whether the credits transfer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Murphy (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
